subtitle.text: Keep your dog safe even when you're not home

title.text: Furbo's  mission is to keep every dog safe and happy

subtitle.text: Furbo's features are designed specifically to keep dogs safe when they are home alone.  This year, Furbo has helped saved 2801 dogs’ lives.

key_visual_image_desktop.alt: Furbo is on a mission to keep every dog safe and happy

key_visual_image_mobile.alt: Furbo is on a mission to keep every dog safe and happy

card_content.text: Furbo saved my dog from a fire!

I recently purchased my Furbo because my baby Kato broke his leg
...read more

- Kato’s loving dog mom

card_expand_content.text: Furbo saved my dog from a fire!

I recently purchased my Furbo because my baby Kato broke his leg and I needed to keep an eye on him when I was out. A few days ago I opened Furbo while I was out for dinner and saw that something was wrong at home. I immediately rushed home to find the house filled with smoke.

- Kato’s loving dog mom

card_content.text: Receiving Furbo’s alerts is crucial. Being there on time saves lives.

We’re lucky Hera’s okay, just minor injuries. Pups push the limits and
...read more

- Loving dog dad, Abel Goldfarb

card_expand_content.text: Receiving Furbo’s alerts is crucial. Being there on time saves lives.

We’re lucky Hera’s okay, just minor injuries. Pups push the limits and end up in dangerous situations.

- Loving dog dad, Abel Goldfarb

card_content.text: Furbo’s Barking Alert saved my dog from carbon monoxide poisoning!

I kept getting Barking Alert notifications
...read more
- Kobe’s loving dog mom

card_expand_content.text: Furbo’s Barking Alert saved my dog from carbon monoxide poisoning!

I kept getting Barking Alert notifications from Furbo so I checked in on my dog. I then heard that our carbon monoxide alarm was going off! So glad that I had Furbo to notify me, or else I may not have come home to my dog alive. You can see in the video my dog was sneezing and did not like the smell.

- Kobe’s loving dog mom

title.text: Furbo’s Home Emergency Alerts save dogs from fires and injuries

subtitle.text: Furbo uses AI technology to detect when a smoke alarm goes off or a glass
breaking sound and send you real-time Home Emergency Alerts.

card_content.text:
Furbo’s Person Alert caught an intruder in my house and the Cloud Recording videos help the police catch him
...read more

- Dexter’s loving dog mom

card_expand_content.text:
Furbo’s Person Alert caught an intruder in my house and the Cloud Recording videos helped the police catch him thanks to Furbo’s recording. Thanks for keeping my home and my pup safe, Furbo!

- Dexter’s loving dog mom

card_content.text:
Thanks to Furbo’s Person Alert and Cloud Recording videos I was able to catch the girl who BROKE INTO MY HOME and ROBBED ME! 
...read more

- Crystal, loving dog mom

card_expand_content.text:
Thanks to Furbo’s Person Alert and Cloud Recording videos I was able to catch the girl who BROKE INTO MY HOME and ROBBED ME! Furbo was the best Christmas gift I could have received and not only can I watch my sweet boy Cooper, but the police have Furbo recordings of the thief and now I can feel safe again. Thanks so much, Furbo!

- Crystal, loving dog mom

card_content.text:
Furbo’s Person Alert notified us someone broke into our house! The police were able to catch him thanks to Furbo’s recording. 
...read more

- Kelly, loving dog mom

card_expand_content.text:
Furbo’s Person Alert notified us someone broke into our house! The police were able to catch him thanks to Furbo’s recording. Thanks for keeping my home and my pup safe, Furbo!

- Kelly, loving dog mom

title.text: Furbo's Person Alerts save dogs from intruders

subtitle.text: Stranger danger! Furbo's Smart Dog Technology can tell the difference
between a dog and a person. Receive Person Alerts when Furbo spots
someone in your home. Make sure no one other than people you trust

card_content.text:
Furbo saved my puppy from potentially injuring herself! My 3 month old puppy figured out how to climb out her pin 
...read more

- Haylee, loving dog mom

card_expand_content.text:
Furbo saved my puppy from potentially injuring herself! My 3 month old puppy figured out how to climb out her pin, and get onto the counters! Thank goodness the Furbo notified me she was barking and I was able to have a family member run home! Love my Furbo! 

- Haylee, loving dog mom

card_content.text:
Today Furbo’s alert saved my dog’s life! Furbo snapped a selfie and showed that Leia had shredded a bag of chocolate truffles 
...read more

- Leia’s loving dog mom

card_expand_content.text:
Today Furbo’s alert saved my dog’s life! Furbo snapped a selfie and showed that Leia had shredded a bag of chocolate truffles - I immediately rushed home just as she had gotten down a bag of dark chocolate. Thank you Furbo - my mini Aussie wouldn’t have done well consuming 5 oz of dark chocolate.

- Leia’s loving dog mom

card_content.text:
Furbo’s Dog Activity Alert notified me my dog was CHEWING ON A RAZOR with 3 BLADES on it! I was able to alert my boyfriend 
...read more

- Kristy, loving dog mom

card_expand_content.text:
Furbo’s Dog Activity Alert notified me my dog was CHEWING ON A RAZOR with 3 BLADES on it! I was able to alert my boyfriend and tell him to go grab it from my dog in the living room. Without Furbo I’m not sure what would have happened. Thank you Furbo for saving my pup!

- Kristy, loving dog mom

title.text: Furbo's Dog Activity Alerts Save Dogs from emergencies

subtitle.text: Anything can happen to your dogs when they’re home alone. When Furbo detects dog movements, it
will send you Dog Activity Alerts. Be alerted of emergencies in real time.

card_content.text: Furbo Tiny House For Homeless Dog
A tiny house built just for senior dog Nemo
Giving Back To Our Medical Heroes
Helping frontlines heroes stay connected to their pups while they’re away fighting for us
ＡGift To Foster & Adoptive Families
Furbo helps pups get adjusted to their new homes
Sponsoring Shelter Dogs Around the World
Working with the Humane Society and other global partners to keep every dog HAPPY and SAFE

title.text: How You Helped Us to Keep EVERY DOG happy and safe in 2020

card_text.text: Sponsor a shelter dog, with your Furbo Dog Camera purchase
Furbo’s mission is to keep every dog safe and happy, even the ones that are still looking for a fur-ever home! Every month, Furbo donates a portion of proceeds to sponsor a shelter dog.

card_image.alt: Share your Furbo story with us

card_text.text: Share your Furbo story with us
We would love to know how Furbo has helped you to keep your dog safe and happy!

title.text: We will continue to keep EVERY DOGS safe and happy

seo.title: Saving Lives | Furbo Dog Camera
seo.meta_description: Unlike other home cameras that send you general motion and sound alerts, Furbo’s Smart Dog Technology monitors your dog’s barking and activities. It will only notify you of dog-related events.
